name: Beats (itch) (FDFInteractive)
description:
You wake up on the couch.

Bad hangover after another argument with your wife...

But where is she, by the way ?

And what are those beats pounding your head ?

Beats, a psychological horror point'n click, black as its atmosphere and white as the narrator's memory... Made for the Indie Horror Jam. 

Thanks for playing !

CREDITS

Game team : Marc Falvo and Natacha Falvo

Font : The boldfont
